page.title: 14 The Ravenhall's Cottage
page.content: The Ravenhall family have lived in Wysteria Cottage' for six years,but the cottage was actually built about four hundred years ago . Since they have lived there, they have made a few necessary alterations. They have had the walls and floor lowered so that the ceiling is the correct height for the beams.They have had damp proof course injected into the walls,central heating put in,and have added an extension at the back of the cottage.The cottage was built on flagstones and there are still traces of Wattle and Daub in the walls.In the lounge there is a split beam where Mr.Ravenhall thinks an inglenook used to stand. The Marquis of Hertford used to own all the houses in area,and the person who used to live in Wysteria Cottage' used to work the land for him.
